title: My phone pixel 3xl purchased in December had been shutting down at 30% battery and won't turn on
content: The phone is shutting down abruptly at 30% battery. I tried to make battery saving mode turn on at 30% but that didn't help. After it shuts down it won't turn on again till plugged in where it displays 0%.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
